Hey everyone! V4.0.0 Our biggest update so far. This version includes many new features and functionality that you have been asking for. New Design In this version we updated the entire app including our logo icon and design. We hope you love it as much as we do! Profile Now you can attach up to 4 profile images that you can share while talking to someone. During a conversation you can change your profile pic and it will instantly change to the other user. Celebrity There are many new Celebrity s that have joined. In addition to being able to talk to your favorite Celebrities you can also follow their Parlor Message Boards and get pictures and updates that you can t see anywhere else. Friends Favorites Now you can easily add friends right from the conversation screen or from your history. You can also tag your friends as Favorites so that your best friends are easy to find. History Now you can see everyone that you have spoken to. We only display conversations that lasted over 10 seconds because if it was less then chances are it wasn t that great. Messaging It works for everyone. No more bugs or errors. simply click on a user from your History or Favorites and select Message. It s that easy. Our in app messaging also is great for emoji s and sharing pics. Direct Calling We know how frustrating it was to meet your new best friend but weren t able to easily call them back from the app. You must be a Favorite of the person you are calling for your call to go through. You never know what the other person might be in the middle of so even though you are one of their Favorites it might be best to send them a quick message to see if they are free to talk. Block Delete Report Users There s always going to be a few users that just don t know how to behave. Please be vigilant and report them correctly right away. the faster you report them the quicker we can ban them. You are also able to delete and block users from both History and Favorites. We have put the last many months into making this version perfect. Please email us with any suggestions questions issues or bugs and we ll do our best to get back with you quickly.

Hey Parlor fans! Thanks so much for checking out our latest release. We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Download the latest version to get all the latest features and improvements. v3.7.6 Lots of bug fixes and crashes under the hood. v3.7.0 Our biggest update so far. This version includes many new features and functionality that you have been asking for. History Now you can see everyone that you have spoken to. We only display conversations that lasted over 10 seconds because if it was less then chances are it wasn t that great. Favorites There are 2 ways to add people to your Favorites. First is when you are connected in conversation you can click the star icon which will automatically add that person to your Favorites or they can be added from the History. Messaging It works for everyone. No more bugs or errors. simply click on a user from your History or Favorites and select Message. It s that easy. Our in app messaging also is great for emoji s and sharing pics. Direct Calling We know how frustrating it was to meet your new best friend but weren t able to easily call them back from the app. You must be a Favorite of the person you are calling for your call to go through. You never know what the other person might be in the middle of so even though you are one of their Favorites it might be best to send them a quick message to see if they are free to talk. But wait.. there s more! New Menu Slider In this version we updated the user interface to take better advantage of many more cool features that the latest iOS devices offer. Block Delete Report Users There s always going to be a few users that just don t know how to behave. Please be vigilant and report them correctly right away. the faster you report them the quicker we can ban them. You are also able to delete and block users from both History and Favorites. We have put the last many months into making this version perfect. Please email us with any suggestions questions issues or bugs and we ll do our best to get back with you quickly.

Much faster connection times. Better sound quality. Substantial performance improvements. Known bugs that have been fixed. Signup bad url . Profile image upload. Mic enabled disable. If you love Parlor please take the time to give us a nice review it really helps.

Parlor has a new look and feel that gets you connected quicker and clearer. We have added the much requested topics: LOL and NSFW. Many other bug fixes and improvements. If you love Parlor as much as we do please leave us an awesome review in the App Store. If you have any questions comments or concerns please contact our support online in the app or email.
